Name

Proposals:
linkingpedia
...
Purpose

To validate a set of links provided by a linking tool, e.g., Silk, Limes, SaquicelaVilches.
We can use this tool to validate the GeoLinkedData links.
OEG Members would validate the links with this tool. Just like the previous evaluations in OEG.
Description

Usually  linking tools generate a rdf file like this
<
http://dbpedia.org/resource/Western_Sahara
>  <
http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs
>  <
http://geo.linkeddata.es/resource/Nacion/SAHARA%20OCCIDENTAL
> .
<
http://dbpedia.org/resource/Madrid
>  <
http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs
>  <
http://geo.linkeddata.es/resource/Provincia/Madrid
> .
....
We propose to develop a web application that reads this file and provides the following interface
The application reads every link,
resource1 linkType resource2
, and shows the information of the resources.
The user validates the link by checking on
Yes, No, Don't know
.
The user also can provide a specific link between two resources.
The user navigates to the following/previous links with the
Next/Previous Link
button
Optionally the user can
visualize the resource in a map (when possible)
translate the resource (using Enterprise LabelTranslator)
The application will store the accepted links.
Planning

Angel volunteers to develop this application in his OEG time.
speaker: SYSTEM
